title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a separate pan, fry the pancetta until crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated pecorino cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and mix with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.
Serve with freshly ground black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, garam masala, and paprika for at least 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, cook the tomatoes with spices until thickened.
Add the cream and grilled chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.
